title: Coin Piles
summaries: Coin Piles are background objects created when the player places a Copper, Silver, Gold, or Platinum Coin on the ground. They are for decorative purposes only. Only one coin is needed to create a pile (which occupies 1 tile, [img:Coin Pile One Tile]), but additional coins can be added to increase the pile size. Coin Piles can, like other furniture, be destroyed with a pickaxe or a drill. This allows a player to pick up the coins again.
Each Coin Pile shown below consists of six placed Coin items.
Coin piles are capable of rarely generating underground, specifically in the <linked>campsite</linked> and <linked>mosaic</linked> mini-biomes.
